Lighting is one of the most underrated elements in a home. But it completely defines the mood and energy. It’s what turns a basic living room into a cozy retreat and a regular backyard into a show-stopping hangout. Your budget gaming setup could even look high-end with just the right application of luminescence.

If you want to completely transform your space, now's your chance. Lepro Smart Lighting is rolling out massive Prime Day discounts on its most powerful gear yet. Get AI-powered lights that sync to your voice, music, or screen content with the LightGPM and LightBeats technology now.

E1 AI outdoor lights

This 150ft light kit offers professional-grade LED nodes at a price rarely seen for its level of customization. You can assign a unique color or shade of white to each node and design lighting sequences that are as subtle or bold as you need. It's also powered with LightGPM, which is Lepro’s built-in AI that uses color psychology and lighting design to recommend effects that match your mood or event. Type your wish in the dedicated app or speak to Google Assistant and Alexa. The system will generate tailored animations for you.

ZB1 AI outdoor string lights

Witness intelligent color control, warm ambiance, and music-reactive lighting in one durable setup. You'll get 30 individually addressable bulbs across 100ft of smart, shatterproof cable. Each bulb is customisable with RGB colors or soft 2700K warm white. It also has IP65 weather protection and is one of the smartest patio upgrades you can make this year.

S1 AI LED bedroom strip lights

Group control on the S1 AI LED Strip Lights allow you to synchronize multiple strips across rooms and control them all at once. You can create a cohesive environment across your bedroom, workspace, and entertainment area. It also has a color segment DIY feature where you'll design your own lighting patterns. Instead of the entire strip glowing one color, you get control over how each stretch of LEDs looks. It's currently $49 and down from $70. 

B1 AI smart light bulbs 

These 2-pack B1 AI Smart Bulbs are shaped like standard A19 bulbs, but the color-fade top and bold coral band labeled AI Lepro instantly hint at the smart features inside. It's preloaded with most of the features on the other light types. It can also react to simple commands, as well as interpret your mood or activity and suggest lighting scenes using the LightGPM engine. They’re $10 instead of $20.

Light your way one room at a time

Let me share some lighting tips that will actually make a difference. Start with using warm white light around 2700K in your bedroom to help you wind down. It’s easier on the eyes and feels more natural at night. Cooler white light from 5000K and up is much better for your workspace or kitchen because it keeps you alert. If you're installing LED strips, place them behind your TV or under shelves instead of out in the open. It looks cleaner and immersive that way. 

If you have smart bulbs, set timers that gradually brighten in the morning to replace your alarm, or dim slowly at night to help you sleep. More importantly, always group similar lights together in the app so that you’re not constantly adjusting each one individually. If your space still needs another major upgrade, there’s a Prime Day deal on 4K TVs with Dolby Vision and a 120Hz refresh rate with up to $280.
